description.raw:
Fixes issue #2479. I can backport to release branches later.

That was a tough one to track down. The issue was being caused by the `EditorMaterialSwitcher`, which is the one responsible for making all models that are not being edited white while one model is being edited. That ignores GUI visuals, which collision visuals are, so setting this flag appropriately fixes the issue.

This fixes two situations, enter the link inspector's collision tab and:

1. Change the collision geometry - the new collision shouldn't be white
1. Delete all collisions, then add one collision - the new collision shouldn't be white

FYI @mrunzzz
